  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:aspect:eri/10004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>aspect:eri/10004</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Informacijska družba</string>
            <string language="en">Information society</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationsgesellschaft</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Société de l'information</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sociedade de informação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Società di informazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνία των πληροφοριών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sociedad de información</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Poglavje o informacijski družbi v sklopu e-gradiva za računalništvo in informatiko. Vsebina poglavja: vpliv računalnika na posameznika/družbo, prednosti slabosti IKT-ja.</string>
            <string language="en">Chapter about information society, part of e-materials for computer science and informatics. Chapter contents: impact of computers on person/society, advantages and disadvantages of ICT.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">informacijska družba</string>
            <string language="en">information society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">družba</string>
            <string language="en">society</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vpliv</string>
            <string language="en">impact</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">prednost</string>
            <string language="en">advantage</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">slabost</string>
            <string language="en">disadvantage</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kapitel über Informationsgesellschaft, Teil 
Ematerialien für Informatik und Informatik. Kapitelinhalt: 
Auswirkung der Computer auf person/society, Vorteile und 
Nachteile von ICT.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chapitre au sujet de la société de 
l'information, partie d'e-matériels pour l'informatique et 
informatique. Contenu de chapitre : impact des ordinateurs
sur person/society, avantages et inconvénients d'ICT.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Capítulo sobre a sociedade de informação, 
parte dos e-materiais para a informática de e informatics. 
Índices do capítulo: impacto dos computadores em 
person/society, em vantagens e em desvantagens de ICT.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capitolo circa la società di informazioni 
facente parte i e-materiali per informatica ed informatica. 
Soddisfare di capitolo: effetto dei calcolatori su 
person/society, su vantaggi e sugli svantaggi di ICT.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κεφάλαιο για την κοινωνία των πληροφοριών, μέρος των 
ε-υλικών για την πληροφορική και την πληροφορική. 
Περιεχόμενο κεφαλαίου: αντίκτυπος των υπολογιστών στο 
πρόσωπο/την κοινωνία, τα πλεονεκτήματα και τα μειονεκτήματα των 
ICT.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capítulo sobre sociedad de información, parte 
de los e-materiales para la informática e informática. 
Contenido del capítulo: impacto de ordenadores en 
person/society, ventajas y desventajas de ICT.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Informationsgesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesellschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswirkung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorteil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nachteil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">société de l'information</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
